backend/main.mo: Defines an actor with one immutable and one mutable variable.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries for all frontend source files and assets.
frontend/.github/workflows/production-pu: GitHub Actions workflow that validates the production slug and required files during pushes and PRs.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Deployment guide detailing slug validation, CI requirements, and pre-deployment steps.
frontend/domain-slug.json: Stores the production deployment slug and metadata.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS base layer with OKLCH color variables and dark-mode theming.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app with metadata and favicon.
frontend/scripts/validate-production-slu: Node script that checks domain-slug.json for the required production slug value.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app composing Hero, Gallery, About, Features, Contact, Header, and Footer.
frontend/src/components/About.tsx: About section with company overview text and two gallery images.
frontend/src/components/BagGallery.tsx: Displays handbag gallery and materials section with images and descriptions.
frontend/src/components/Contact.tsx: Contact section with company details and embedded inquiry form.
frontend/src/components/ContactForm.tsx: Implements a validated contact form with state handling, simulated submission, and a success message display.
frontend/src/components/Features.tsx: Renders a features section listing key company advantages using cards and icons.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Displays the site footer with brand info, navigation links, services, contact details, and social icons.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Creates a responsive header with scroll-based styling, desktop and mobile navigation, and smooth section scrolling.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Provides the hero section with marketing text, CTA buttons, and an image with decorative elements.
frontend/src/components/SectionLayout.ts: Wraps content in a standardized section layout with padding and container styling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity authentication and invalidates dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements authentication context and provider for Internet Identity, handling login, identity loading, and state management.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and global CSS variables for light/dark themes, applying Times New Roman italic styling siteâ€‘wide.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, color tokens from CSS variables, custom animations, and typography/plugins.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, feature definitions, deployment notes, and styling/content requirements for the website.
